title: Mopth(i?)
description: An ancient settlement and fort known in the 19th and 20th centuries as Henchir el-Ksar. It is located at the eastern foot of the Guellal-ta-Attar where lies the confluence of the Oued Safsaf and the Oued Ghriba (in the modern Algerian municipality of Beni Fouda, SÃ©tif Province). It was on the main ancient route linking Sitifis and Cuicul.

properties.description: Location determined in Google Earth with reference to description and plans in Galand 1949.
properties.title: Imagery Location of El-Ksar Fortress
